Low-level streams for high performance.

Imports

pathutils

TLLStream = object of RootObj
  kind*: TLLStreamKind
  f*: File
  s*: string
  rd*, wr*: int
  lineOffset*: int
  repl*: TLLRepl
  onPrompt*: OnPrompt
